content.prompt: Which of the following statements accurately describes the rhythmic patterns in box B?

choices.label: All note values are less than a full beat.
All note values are more than a full beat.
The strong beats feature a dotted rhythm pattern.
The weak beats feature a dotted rhythm pattern.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
